comment:
* This class represents a request to an {@link RotationResolverService}. The request contains
 * information from the system that can help RotationResolverService to determine the appropriate
 * screen rotation.
 *
 * @see RotationResolverService#resolveRotation(IRotationResolverCallback,
 * RotationResolutionRequest, ICancellationSignal)
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: mForegroundPackageName
variables.comment: The Name of the package of the current fore-ground activity.

variables.name: mCurrentRotation
variables.comment: The current rotation of the screen.

variables.name: mProposedRotation
variables.comment: The proposed screen rotation in the system.

variables.name: mShouldUseCamera
variables.comment: Whether should use the camera sensor to resolve screen rotation.

methods.name: public String getForegroundPackageName()
methods.comment: * The Name of the package of the current fore-ground activity.

methods.name: public int getCurrentRotation()
methods.comment: * The current rotation of the screen.

methods.name: public int getProposedRotation()
methods.comment: * The proposed screen rotation in the system.

methods.name: public boolean shouldUseCamera()
methods.comment: * Whether should use the camera sensor to resolve screen rotation.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
